steps.title: Agent submits profile
steps.description: After exploring the timeline, the agent calls write_section to submit its identity profile.

steps.title: Coverage gate denies
steps.description: CoverageTracker detects only 2 of 3 sources explored. Returns PermissionResultDeny.
steps.code: PermissionResultDeny('Missing sources: github. Explore all platforms before writing.')

steps.title: Agent explores missing source
steps.description: The agent browses GitHub events, finding 12-year commit history and open-source contributions.

steps.title: Profile accepted
steps.description: With all sources explored, the coverage gate passes. The profile now reflects the complete digital footprint.
